title: Love Never Fails
description: LOVE NEVER FAILS is a Christian romance set in Texas after WW2, leading on into the 1950s. Chancy Thompson follows her pastor husband to various churches as the Lord leads him. Although there are sometimes problems with members or family, Chancy's faith in God holds strong. His love doesn't fail her and her love never fails through it all. This is the fourth book in the historical fiction series Chance on Love. Check out all of them: LOVE REJOICES IN THE TRUTH, LOVE IS PATIENT, and LOVE ENDURES ALL THINGS. They follow the family from the Depression Era on. LOVE HOPES ALL THINGS will be coming soon.
author: Ashley Ricks
